properties.name: Cherry Street Pier

facts.fact: City Hall was the tallest habitable building in the world from 1894 to 1908.
The 5.5 mile Delaware River Trail project connects to the Cherry Street Peer.
Cherry Street Peer houses close to a dozen artist studios in addition to an outdoor restaurant and bar and open performance venue.

properties.question: A transparent space open to all, a framework on the water.
properties.statement: The first public home of the Public Orchestra of Philadelphia.
